Uses of Package
supermario

  • Classes in supermario used by supermario 
    Class and Description
    Block
    Common class for all types of blocks in the grid
    Block.BlockType
    types of possible blocks
    Collectible
    Collectible blocks, items that help in the game inheritance not implemented, two implemented collectible types are different only in one function derives from Block
    Control
    control of the keyboard commands saves all pressed keys and sends them for evaluation
    Enemy
    common abstract class for all kinds of implemented enemies evaluates their movement and state derives from Block
    GamePanel
    GamePanel is place where the graphics of the game are drawn derives from JPanel
    Map
    Map to be generated grid of Blocks ROWS * COLS created form .txt file
    Mario
    Character class, takes care of the Mario's attributes and movements
